form.div: You have outstanding payments for this customer. You can allocate them to mark this invoice as paid.

field.name: help
field.p: Note that the easiest way to create a credit note is to do it directly from the customer invoice.

field.name: help
field.p: Create invoices, register payments and keep track of the discussions with your customers.

field.name: help
field.p: Note that the easiest way to create a vendor credit note it to do it directly from the vendor bill.

button.name: print_invoice_waste
button.attrs: {'invisible':['|','|', ('type','!=','out_invoice'), ('invoice_type','not in',['Waste Rotary','Waste Pabrik PPN','Waste Pabrik Non-PPN']), ('state','not in',['draft','proforma','open'])]}

button.name: print_packing_list_waste
button.attrs: {'invisible':['|','|', ('type','!=','out_invoice'), ('invoice_type','not in',['Waste Rotary','Waste Pabrik PPN','Waste Pabrik Non-PPN']), ('state','not in',['draft','proforma','open'])]}
